divs: sighting detailsi was out in my backyard (carlsbad, ca) and a very interesting flying object caught my eye to the south (off coast heading inland). i estimate it was about 20 miles away, about 3 miles in altitude and flying fast (much faster than other aircraft in the sky). it had a very large red light or orb with two large arching spans of light\contrail in the shape of a fan trailing behind. the edges of the fan\arch had different colors and the interior of the fan was white. i observed it for about 7 seconds and then it completely disappeared; reappearing after a few seconds ��� for another 4-5 seconds before it was gone. the sky was clear - no clouds\fog. i could see stars and other aircraft. when i first saw i didn't think it was a meteor, it didn't look like a plane, maybe a rocket having problems? it was not a helicopter or typical plane. just thought i���d pass it along to see if anyone else out there saw it!
Summary: Large red sphere with very large light/comtrail arching to left and right.
trends: There have been 151 other sightings in San Diego
There were no other sightings in San Diego on or around April 14th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
